lead_paragraph: An award-winning pastry chef imagines dessert as a force of nature, brought to life by R. O. Blechman’s animation.

headline.main: If 2015 Was a Dessert, It Would Probably Be an Ice Cream Blizzard
headline.print_headline: World Outlook: A Taste of the Year
